commit_msg:
fixing bug #161 to ensure plugins built off debug build of xacc can themselves build

Signed-off-by: Alex McCaskey <mccaskeyaj@ornl.gov>
author_comment: Reporter: "If we build xacc from scratch in debug mode, then downstream plugins report usResourceCompiler-NOTFOUND when trying to use the CppMicroServices usResourceCompiler4 executable target."
